description: This aromatic and spicy Thai green curry is a tasty and exciting dinner option.
name: Thai Style Green Curry with Kaffir Lime Leaves Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium green chillies, de-seeded and chopped
1 small red chilli, de-seeded and chopped
2 stalks lemongrass, outer layer removed. body sliced.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pot on a medium heat, fry the veg and herbs in the sesame oil for 2 minutes. Now add the rest of the ingredients apart from the coconut milk and fry for another 2 minutes while mixing.
Now add the coconut milk and using a hand blender, blitz until smooth. Allow this all to simmer now until the sauce reduces to at least 1 third the size. Remove from the heat and store.
